text: Danny Shaw who's joined me now we don't
know very much yet about this Danny it
sounds we should stress like a small
incident but what do we know well the
good news is that it looks as though
this incident has been contained and
that no one has been injured the
Metropolitan Police are saying that
there are no reports of any injuries and
a person has been arrested but the
pictures that you can see on the screen
and also on social media images appear
to show certainly one image I've seen
someone lying on the ground surrounded
by armed police and then later images
appeared and show two knives on the
ground now one witness told me that he
saw two knives on the ground one of them
was a large bread knife it appears that
there's a bag near those two knives on
on certainly one of the images that I've
seen and there are reports that someone
with her with a bag or a rucksack was
tackled by armed police
another report said the knives fell out
of the ground now of course all these
reports could be slightly misleading
there's no confirmation of that but it
looks as though someone has been
arrested by police and that two knives
have been found nearby now now the
location of this is right in the center
of Westminster it's just near Parliament
Square coming down Whitehall so it's
just on the corner of Parliament Square
and Whitehall very close to the houses
of parliament and where the dreadful
attack by Holly Massoud took place last
month so there will be echoes of that
attack but thankfully on this occasion
it looks as though no one has been hurt
